PageTitle: advertise l2vpn evpn (BGP multi-instance VPN instance IPv4 address family view)
FuncDef:
The advertise l2vpn evpn command enables a device to advertise IP routes from a VPN instance to its EVPN instance.
The undo advertise l2vpn evpn command restores the default configuration.. The advertise l2vpn evpn command enables a device to advertise IP routes from a VPN instance to its EVPN instance. The undo advertise l2vpn evpn command restores the default configuration.. By default, a device is disabled from advertising IP routes from a VPN instance to its EVPN instance. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: undo advertise l2vpn evpn [ import-route-multipath ] [ include-local-cross-route ]
ParentView: BGP multi-instance VPN instance IPv4 address family view

ParaDef.Info:
Advertises all routes with the same destination address in a VPN instance to an EVPN instance.
-

Advertises all routes of local cross in a VPN instance to an EVPN instance.
-
